sentences: Minu vend tegi pärast jalgpallimänge alasti basseini.
Tema poeg on alasti jäänud kodus, kui nad läksid rannale.
Ta soovis, et nad peaksid alasti jäma, et saaksid paremini sõita.
context: 'alasti' in Estonian describes a state of being without clothes. It is commonly used to describe someone who is not wearing any clothing or parts of the body that are exposed and not covered, such as after swimming or playing sports.
